title: Reset Password
content: Users can reset their password by going to Settings > Security > Reset Password.

title: Refund Policy
content: Refunds are allowed within 7 days of purchase. After 7 days, refunds are not available.

title: Change Email
content: Users can change their email address from Settings > Profile > Email.

title: Delete Account
content: Users can delete their account from Settings > Account > Delete Account. This action is permanent and cannot be reversed.

title: Subscription Plans
content: The product offers Basic, Pro, and Enterprise plans. Users can upgrade or downgrade from the Billing section.

title: Cancel Subscription
content: Users can cancel their subscription from Settings > Billing > Cancel Plan. Access will remain active until the end of the billing cycle.

title: Contact Support
content: Users can contact support by emailing support@example.com. Response time is usually within 24 hours.
